div.h2: Minnesota Math and Science Academy Charter School

div.p:
Parents can apply to MMSA online
for K-11 grades here.

a.class: stm-btn stm-btn_outline stm-btn_white stm-btn_md stm-btn_icon-right stm-btn_color_white

div.class: wpb_column vc_column_container vc_col-sm-6 vc_col-lg-8 vc_col-md-7 vc_col-xs-12

div.p: Minnesota Math & Science Academy is a public charter school serving Kindergarten through ninth grades managing by Concept Schools. Concept Schools is a nonprofit charter management organization that provides a high-quality, STEM-focused and college-preparatory education through a network of charter schools while offering exceptional programs, comprehensive services, and opportunities to partner in education.

div.class: wpb_column vc_column_container vc_col-sm-6 vc_col-lg-4 vc_col-md-5 vc_col-xs-12

the 2019—20 academic year.

wpb_column vc_column_container vc_col-sm-12 vc_col-lg-8 vc_col-md-8 vc_col-xs-12

div.p: My child has noticed great changes in the past couple months and is very happy there.
I like that my son always come home and tell me something new he learned and he has an amazing teacher.
Classrooms from kindergarten and up feature state of the art technology as well as every possible resource available to assist in educating today’s child for tomorrow’s success.

div.class: wpb_column vc_column_container vc_col-sm-12 vc_col-lg-2 vc_col-md-2 vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs

div.span: Minnesota Math and Science Academy is managed by Concept Schools. Concept Schools is a nonprofit charter management organization that provides a high-quality, STEM-focused and college-preparatory education through a network of charter schools while offering exceptional programs, comprehensive services, and opportunities to partner in education.

ul.li: 169 East Jenks Avenue Saint Paul MN 55117
